package.name: Image_Graph
package.summary: Drawing graphs out of numerical data (traffic, money, ...)
package.description: Features: - drawing graphs in various formats (line, bar, points marked by squares/rhombs/triangles/...) - multiple graphs in one diagram - up to 2 Y-axes - flexible Y-value-output-customisation - variable ticks for the Y-axes - color-support - ...

release.notes: - splitted package into smaller classes to get a more intuitive API - renamed marker "rhomb" to "diamond" - added workarounds for better results with current Image_Text v0.2 - applied new directory-structure for package (as defined by the core-group)
- fixed filenames for the current Image_Text-package - did some minor bugfixes that came up when running with full error_reporting
